about.summary:
💻 Full Stack Software Engineer
🚀 Developer with strong experience in frontend (Angular, React) and backend (Spring Boot), involved in all stages of the software lifecycle from design to production deployment.
🛒 Worked on eCommerce projects using Shopify, developing with both Liquid and headless architectures with React frontends.
🔄 Experience working in agile teams (Scrum/Kanban) and version control with Git.
🛠️ Technologies: Angular, React, Java (Spring Boot), Firebase, AWS/GCP, Docker, CI/CD (Jenkins), Python, Langchain.
💥 Proven ability to create and deliver robust, scalable web solutions from scratch to production, quickly adapting to new technologies and requirements.

🌐 Languages: Spanish (native) | English (advanced)
🎓 Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Engineering, University of Alicante
📱 Currently learning mobile development and web solutions with AI

work.name: Freelance
highlights: Developed applications from scratch to production.
Deployed a self host Jenkins server for easing deployments while ensuring final product quality
Shopify headless and liquid developing some ecommerces

work.name: Apps Square S.L.
work.summary: Full time full stack with front end focus developing and maintaining a CRM application with complete integration in Trello and Jira.
highlights: Collaborated with UX/UI designers to enhance user experience.
Implemented automated testing procedures, improving code quality.
Integrate third party APIs, Trello, Jira, Zapier, Make, and more.
Developing microservices architecture with Spring Boot (Java)
Angular, SCSS, Typescript, Java, Spring Boot, MySQL, MongoDB, REST, Microservices, Kubernetes, CI/CD
